author: Special Correspondent
text:
The mudslinging and hate campaign of the DMK and the AIADMK against each other have exposed paucity of ideas of the 50-year rule of the Dravidian parties, PMK’s chief ministerial candidate Anbumani Ramadoss has said.

“The two parties are incapable of decent politics and do not have any constructive ideas to offer. The people of Tamil Nadu are watching their dirty war of words,” Dr. Anbumani said, while releasing a campaign CD of the PMK containing six songs.

An auto-rickshaw driver, two sweepers and a flower vendor received the first copy of the CD .

On whether the PMK would revive the alliance comprising the BJP and the DMDK, Dr. Anbumani said all political parties barring the DMK and the AIADMK could join the alliance.
title: ‘DMK, AIADMK incapable of decent politics’
